name: Tuscan [TVR Range] - Mens Classic Tee
description: The inaugural design in ScapeGoat Racing's TVR range, inspired by the stunning Tuscan Speed Six, our Tuscan design aims to capture the jaw-dropping looks of this amazing targa-roofed super-coupe. And if you're into your 'tivs' then check our main site for other TVR designs coming soon; www.scapegoat-racing.co.uk. This design is available on plain-white 'classic' t-shirt, and *coming soon* on 'ringer tee'. For our other designs, visit our main site at www.scapegoat-racing.co.uk.

name: Cobra [Classics Range] - Mens Classic Tee
description: What do you get when you combine the pretty little AC Ace with a snarling big-block Ford V8? One of the most well-know sportscars of all time: the AC Cobra. It took the US sportscar racing scene by storm and went on, in 'Daytona' coupe-form, to take on the Ferraris at Le Mans. Such is its appeal that the Cobra has become the most replicated car of all time, but original or replica, this monster always gets noticed ... and now you can do the same on your local high-street! This design is inspired by the unmistakable Cobra, wearing the classic dark blue with twin stripes. It is available on plain white 'classic' t-shirt and *coming soon* on navy 'ringer' tee. For our other designs, visit our main site at www.scapegoat-racing.co.uk.

name: Super Seven [Classics Range] - Mens Classic Tee
description: This design was inspired by the Lotus Seven, a car that embodies driving at its purest; an engine, 4-wheels, rear-wheel drive and not alot else! - Let's be honest, we've all wanted to have a go in one. This Super Seven design captures this unique & much reproduced little car in the classic 60's green & yellow scheme. This design is available on black 'classic' t-shirt, and *coming soon* on black 'ringer tee'. For our other designs, visit our main site at www.scapegoat-racing.co.uk.

name: Detroit Racer [Classics Range] - Mens Classic Tee
description: The inaugural design of ScapeGoat Racing and the cornerstone of our Classics range, the Detroit Racer was inspired by one of the most iconic racers from the golden age of GT racing, the Ford GT40, in the striking and instantly recognisable 'Gulf Racing' livery. 2013 is also the 50th anniversary of this revolutionary car, so celebrate in style with our Detroit Racer shirt. This design is available on plain-white 'classic' t-shirt, and *coming soon* on blue 'ringer tee'. For our other designs, visit our main site at www.scapegoat-racing.co.uk.
